tier_1_voting.name: Random Sound
tier_1_voting.description: Plays a random sound cue from all available Tiers

tier_1_voting.name: Ambient Droning Sound
tier_1_voting.description: Plays a long ambient sound cue

tier_1_voting.name: No Swearing Challenge
tier_1_voting.description: Participant is not allowed to swear (3 Minutes Duration)

tier_2_voting.name: Earphones Swap
tier_2_voting.description: Participant must swap around left and right earphones

tier_2_voting.name: No Stopping
tier_2_voting.description: Participant must not stop moving for (3 Minutes Duration)

tier_2_voting.name: Low Sensitivity
tier_2_voting.description: Participant must lower move/look sensitivity as low as it can go for (3 Minutes Duration)

tier_2_voting.name: Only Left Turns
tier_2_voting.description: Whenever turning, the Participant must only turn left (3 Minutes Duration)

tier_3_voting.name: Only Backwards Walking
tier_3_voting.description: Participant can only walk backwards (3 Minutes Duration)

tier_3_voting.name: Every Noise
tier_3_voting.description: Participant must immediately check out every in-game noise (3 Minutes Duration)

tier_3_voting.name: No Flashlight
tier_3_voting.description: Participant cannot use any lighting source from character (3 Minutes Duration)

tier_3_voting.name: Cross Hands
tier_3_voting.description: Participant must cross hands while playing (3 Minutes Duration)
